



ABSTRACT: 3rd Party\ METROWERKS DIRECTORY			7/10/98


This directory contains PlayStation libraries and executables associated 
with the Metroworks CodeWarrior for PlayStation:

	Directory		Contents
	-----------------------------------------------------------
	Lib			Contains previously released versions of
				the libraries (including patches) from
				Library 3.5 to Library 4.1, as well as library 4.3
				in CodeWarrior format for the Macintosh and
				IBM PC compatibles.
